markdown: Draining Whip;Draining Whip (Ascendant);Draining Whip (Beguiler) | rel_items = | rel_characters = | internalname = Draining_Whip_Beguiler | guid = 3343d9e9-61f1-4f94-aed4-04b5dee16707 }} '''{{Pagename nd}}''' is an [ability](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireAbilities/) in {{poe2}}. ## Description {{Description|{{#var:description}}}} ## Effects {{#var:effects_formatted}} ## Notes * A target is vulnerable to a Sneak Attack if they are currently [Flanked](/flanked/), or are suffering from a [Mind](/mindAffliction/) or [Body](/bodyAffliction/) [Affliction](/statusEffectsDeadfireAfflictions/). * The Focus bonus is a little confusing. The base damage-to-focus ratio for a Beguiler is 0.25 (instead of the usual 0.5). Draining Whip applies a +100% modifier (x1.0) to this ratio all the time, and then a further +100% when the target is vulnerable to a Sneak Attack. Both of these modifiers are stacked additively, not multiplicatively (the multipliers are added together before being applied to the base ratio), resulting in 0.25 + (0.25 * (1 + 1)) = 0.75. ## Bugs * The full bonus should apply if the target has a [Mind Affliction](/mindAffliction/), however it currently applies if the target has a [Mind Inspiration](/mindInspiration/) instead (as of patch 5.0.0.0040 this has not been fixed).
